content:
I think I'll also ask my grandfather about his experiences during the Indian independence movement. I've always been fascinated by his stories about the freedom fighters and the role he played in the struggle for independence. I'd love to hear more about what it was like to be part of such a pivotal moment in Indian history.

Can I ask, are there any specific questions or topics I should focus on when asking about his experiences during the independence movement? Are there any particular stories or anecdotes that might be especially interesting or significant to capture?
